base_review: Where is a place with a comfortable indoor environment?

similar_review.review: A large spacious place. If you want; you can relax inside and have something to drink.
The indoor atmosphere was nice; but I can't say the same for the outdoor
Stylish; decent and clean place. I advise.
The view is nice; the indoor seating area is quite large.

It is in the center; easy to reach; close to the parking lot; the prices are partially affordable; the products are delicious but not quite satisfying; the seating places are cramped; the place is a little flat.

base_review: Where is a good restaurant to go to with family?

similar_review.review: A decent place. You can eat as a family. You can eat many kinds of fish as grilled; fried or stewed.
Nice intimate restaurant. Good service. Eye for detail. Clean. Really good food; well presented.
Everyone is smilingÄ° the food is delicious. Great place; I recommend it.
A nice cozy place. It is easily accessible from all parts of the city. It is very interesting that the restaurant does not have a menu.

We went to Marmaris with my wife for a holiday. We chose this restaurant as a place for dinner based on the reviews and because we wanted juicy food. When we first went there was a serious queue. You proceed by taking the food you want in the form of an open buffet. Both vegetable dishes and meat dishes were plentiful. There was also dessert for those who wanted it. After you get what you want you pay at the cashier. They don't go through cards they work in cash. There was a lot of food variety. And the food prices were unbelievably cheap. We paid only 84 TL for all the meals here. It included buttermilk and bread. But unfortunately I can't say it's too clean as a place..

base_review: A restaurant I strongly do not recommend.

similar_review.review: A fast food restaurant with very friendly staff. It didn't appeal to my taste at all. Undercooked dough and lint meat.

The waiters are generally very sullen and unhappy. Service is very slow. Nothing extra comes to the table. Even the starter appetizer; which is available in many kebab shops; does not come. Lahmacun was very dry and tasteless.
A restaurant that has lost its previous refinement. Lahmacun as seen in the photo. The service is slow. I recommend a little more wannabe and attention.
A nice cozy place. It is easily accessible from all parts of the city. It is very interesting that the restaurant does not have a menu.
Ambience is very nice but they don't let you work at the outside tables; that is a negative point.
